LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.EnableCategory.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the products will be fetched from Solr Index instead of SQL database for Category Catalog pages. Enabling this feature will help you significantly improve performance of your Category Catalog pages.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.CategoryAjaxFaceting.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable this feature will use Ajax otherwise load full page on Facet selection

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.CategoryInfiniteScrolling.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable/Disable Infinite Scrolling for use infinite scrolling

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.CategoryInfiniteScrollingTillPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Add numeric value for load number of product for infinite scrolling on catagory page

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.CategoryShowNoOfProductsFound.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If Enable then Number of Products Found String will shown on Catalog as well as Search page

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.CategoryEnableSearchWithin.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If enable, then search within category functionality will be available

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.EnableManufacturer.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the products will be fetched from Solr Index instead of SQL database for Manufacturer Catalog pages. Enabling this feature will help you significantly improve performance of your Manufacturer Catalog pages.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.ManufacturerAjaxFaceting.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable this feature will use Ajax otherwise load full page on Facet selection

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.ManufacturerInfiniteScrolling.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable/Disable Infinite Scrolling for use infinite scrolling

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.ManufacturerInfiniteScrollingTillPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Add numeric value for load number of product for infinite scrolling on manufacturer page

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.ManufacturerShowNoOfProductsFound.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If Enable then No of Products Found String will shown on Catalog as well as Search page

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.ManufacturerEnableSearchWithin.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If enable, then search within Manufacturer functionality will be available

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.EnableVendor.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the products will be fetched from Solr Index instead of SQL database for Vendor Catalog pages. Enabling this feature will help you significantly improve performance of your Vendor Catalog pages.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.VendorAjaxFaceting.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable this feature will use Ajax otherwise load full page on Facet selection

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.VendorInfiniteScrolling.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable/Disable Infinite Scrolling for use infinite scrolling

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.VendorInfiniteScrollingTillPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Add numeric value for load number of product for infinite scrolling on vendor page

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.VendorShowNoOfProductsFound.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If Enable then No of Products Found String will shown on Catalog as well as Search page

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.VendorEnableSearchWithin.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If enable, then search within Vendor functionality will be available

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.EnableProductTag
LocaleResource.Value: Load Product Tag From Solr Index

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.EnableProductTag.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the products will be fetched from Solr Index instead of SQL database for ProductTag Catalog pages. Enabling this feature will help you significantly improve performance of your ProductTag Catalog pages.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.ProductTagAjaxFaceting.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable this feature will use Ajax otherwise load full page on Facet selection

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.ProductTagInfiniteScrolling.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable/Disable Infinite Scrolling for use infinite scrolling

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.ProductTagInfiniteScrollingTillPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Add numeric value for load number of product for infinite scrolling on producttag page

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.ProductTagShowNoOfProductsFound.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If Enable then No of Products Found String will shown on Catalog as well as Search page

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Search.Field.Catalog.ProductTagEnableSearchWithin.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If enable, then search within productTag functionality will be available

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.NopAcceleratePlus.Catalog.License.Expire.Warning
LocaleResource.Value: There has been an issue with license for the nopAccelerate Catalog. you're using. And therefore the plugin is not in active state. Please contact nopAccelerate Support team by visiting our website or by emailing at support@nopAccelerate.com.
